channel.title: Comments on: The Trip – Day 27 – San Francisco
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: :) It's just kind of nice when a bird sits right in front of you minding its own business. It gives a kind of a relaxed feeling.
item.content:encoded: :) It’s just kind of nice when a bird sits right in front of you minding its own business. It gives a kind of a relaxed feeling.

item.title: By: 725176
item.description: I am looking for the "bird of the day". You love birds, am I right?
item.content:encoded: I am looking for the “bird of the day”. You love birds, am I right?
